elements.name: Verify API: getSquadCount API return Total Squad Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getSquadCount"
User calls "getSquadCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify squad_Count result is greater than 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createSquad API add Squad payload

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Squad Payload with Param = "none"
User calls "createSquad" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Squad instance
Verify Total squad_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createSquad API with no squad Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Squad Payload  with no Squad Body
User calls "createSquad" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.squad.entity.Squad com.ibm.dc.squad.controller.SquadController.createSquad(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.squad.entity.Squad)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.squad.entity.Squad com.ibm.dc.squad.controller.SquadController.createSquad(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.squad.entity.Squad)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllSquads API return List of All Squads

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllSquads"
User calls "getAllSquads" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Squads
Total number of Squad in List is equal to getSquadCount
Squad added exist in returned Squad List

elements.name: Verify API: getSquadBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getSquadBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getSquadBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Squads

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError: All Squads not searched in case of no Search Criteria: array lengths differed, expected.length=18 actual.length=0
	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88)
	at org.junit.internal.ComparisonCriteria.assertArraysAreSameLength(ComparisonCriteria.java:71)
	at org.junit.internal.ComparisonCriteria.arrayEquals(ComparisonCriteria.java:32)
	at org.junit.Assert.internalArrayEquals(Assert.java:473)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertArrayEquals(Assert.java:265)
	at stepDefinitions.SquadStepDefinition.response_should_be_list_all_Squads_getAllSquads(SquadStepDefinition.java:133)
	at ✽.Response should be list all Squads=getAllSquads(file:///C:/Users/KumariRupam/eclipse-workspace/BDD_FW/src/test/java/features/Squad.feature:45)

steps.name: Response should be list all Squads=getAllSquads

elements.name: Verify API: getSquadBySearchCriteria API, search by 'squadId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getSquadBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "squadId"
User calls "getSquadBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Squads
Response should be list of Squads and size should be one
Squad added exist in returned Squad List

elements.name: Verify API: deleteSquad update Squad status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteSquad with Parameter: "squadId"
User calls "deleteSquad" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify SquadStatus of particular Squad updated as Passive

elements.name: Verify API: deleteSquad API,  with invalid squadId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteSquad" with invalid Parameter: "squadId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteSquad" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Squad with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteSquad API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deleteSquad" with no Param
User calls "deleteSquad" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'squadId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateSquad API add Squad paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Squad Payload with Param = "squadId"
User calls "updateSquad" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify Squad fields gets updated
